DIA_13415_ManHunter_Q406_03_01: Marvin! We've been looking for you!
DIA_13415_ManHunter_Q406_03_02: You know, we need to talk urgently...
DIA_13415_ManHunter_Q406_03_03: But this is not the right place for such a conversation. Come with us!
DIA_13415_ManHunter_Q406_NoFuckYou_15_01: I'm not going anywhere with you!
DIA_13415_ManHunter_Q406_NoFuckYou_03_02: All right, don't be nervous! We just want to help...
DIA_13415_ManHunter_AreYouFollowingMe_03: No... We're just going the same way.
